full_summary:
## Official Tender Announcement for EW038-231205 Furniture

Government of Canada Tender Announcement
======================================

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3734734140-Doc3736175150
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3734734140
* **Publication Date**: November 17, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 23, 2022, 14:00 EST

### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested suppliers to submit tenders for the EW038-231205 Furniture procurement. This requirement covers the supply of commercial and industrial furniture, including products such as interconnecting panels and freestanding systems, metal filing and storage cabinets, and ancillary and lighting products.

### Notice Type

This tender notification is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA).

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Tender Status

The tender status is Expired.

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact:
Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC)
kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
